title: BMW to Show Off New EV on Christmas Eve
description:
BMW has seen strong demand for its new iX3. It’s one of the hottest vehicles in Europe already. But it won’t be the newest, hottest EV from BMW soon. Well, it appears that’s the case anyway. View this post on Instagram BMW has put out a teaser about a new ... [continued]

The post BMW to Show Off New EV on Christmas Eve appeared first on CleanTechnica.
